alert.note: Alert for Chilton (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 5:12PM CDT until June 17 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Chilton County in central Alabama... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 512 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chilton County Motor Sports Park, or near Jemison, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clanton, Jemison, Thorsby, Billingsley, Chilton County Motor Sports Park, Verbena, Pooles Crossroads, Lomax, Isabella, I 65 Rest Area and Cooper. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
